item.title: How to add commands?
item.dc:creator: @anc13ntpk3r anc13ntpk3r
item.description:
@anc13ntpk3r wrote:

ok go into client.Java and search this:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase

now at the end of the command you will see a

}

between that and the next command make a space like so

[code]
}

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase[/code]

and insert your command here like so:

}
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("pker") {
addItem(4578,1);
addItem(1115,1);
addItem(1067,1);
addItem(3105,1);
addItem(775,1);
addItem(391,1000000);
sendMessage("You are know OFFICIAL!");
}
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(" ")

and if you can’t figure this out, stop coding right now! lol

Read full topic

item.title: How to add commands?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

First of all you command is wrong its supposed to be:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pker") { addItem(4578,1); addItem(1115,1); addItem(1067,1); addItem(3105,1); addItem(775,1); addItem(391,1000000); sendMessage("You are know OFFICIAL!"); sendMessage(" "); //delte this if you dont use it duh! }
if you arent going to use the second sendMessage line use this…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pker") { addItem(4578,1); addItem(1115,1); addItem(1067,1); addItem(3105,1); addItem(775,1); addItem(391,1000000); sendMessage("You are know OFFICIAL!"); }

put it under another command in you client.java file,

like press crtl+f and seartch for starter
and look for a } or { under the whole command and place it there…

you dont use " && playerRights >= 0)" if its for every player… and you dont put ::pker in the java scripts for commands you put simply whats its name is in this case it will be “pker”

THAT SIMPLE.

Read full topic

I made the code
f(command.equalsIgnoreCase("::pker")&& playerRights >= 0){ //Voule Command Generator if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("::pker")){ //Voule Command Generator
addItem(4578,1);
addItem(1115,1);
addItem(1067,1);
addItem(3105,1);
addItem(775,1);
addItem(391,1000000);
sendMessage(“You are know OFFICIAL!”);
sendMessage(" ");
}
